## Notes

<!-- Additional notes or comments -->

---

**Instructions for Use:**
1. Create a training log for each employee
2. Record all QMS-related training
3. Obtain signatures at time of training completion
4. Maintain per document retention requirements
5. Review during management review for training effectiveness
